genresAdvancedInfo.name: african metal
genresAdvancedInfo.description: African metal is a fusion of traditional African rhythms and heavy metal music. It often incorporates tribal instruments such as djembe and balafon, as well as African vocal styles. The genre is known for its energetic and powerful sound, with fast-paced guitar riffs and complex drum patterns.
